ygData.subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Introducing a new friend ;)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hahahaha, Misty s hubby not as prevert as us lah.  His kid already a teenager, even if he is one, he can t behave so in front of his kid and wife mah ;) On
ygData.messageBody:
Hahahaha, Misty's hubby not as prevert as us lah. His kid already a
teenager, even if he is one, he can't behave so in front of his kid and
wife mah ;)

On Wednesday, 07 June, 2000 6:40 PM, whirlnuc
[SMTP:whirlnuc@...] wrote:
> Lvl 46 shaman!?! The gods has mercy on me, no more stress in guild
events!!! Im
> starting to feel younger....... :)
>
> P.S Oh yea, he must be 100% pervert b4 can join us :) J/K
>
> Trifrost The Old Man
>
> LKW wrote:
>
> > Thx brother preve..ops I mean brother BiBi for ya utmost support ;P
> >
> > Anyway I cant recruit them yet even with ya vote, else our GM will
remove
> > me, hehehe.
> >
> > According our great leader, I need to get either of the followings to
> > recruit new members:
> >
> > 1. 5 officers.
> > 2. 2 officers + 5 members.
> >
> > Can I get some more support from our guys? ;) Thx!
> >
> > To strengthen my stand, let me give a more detail description on both
> > players.
> >
> > Yura is well-known as a power-player in my UO guild, and she is one of
my
> > UO members who established their chars fast yet w/o much assistance
except
> > some advice and start-up fund. She is also those hard-working type
who is
> > willing to spend time in training her chars.
> >
> > Misty, on the other hand, is a born leader and know how to take care of
> > those newer members very much (should I say "motherlike"? hehe). She is
> > also very experience in RPG training and very independent. She
actually
> > has her RL son, a lvl 40ish monk, and her RL husband, lvl 46 shaman
playing
> > in the same server. I would like to get all of them in but due to the
big
> > difference in timezone, I leave it to u guys to vote. Of coz I would
love
> > to get her in, but I also wanan ensure she can contributed and also
enjoy
> > full benefit & fun if she were to join us. She is also the first
female
> > pioneer in my UO guild and work all the way to her vice-GM position.
> >
> > Talk abt contribution, I'm very sure both of them will be a great asset
to
> > our guild in time to come ;) So more support pls, thx thx!
> >
> > On Wednesday, 07 June, 2000 4:29 PM, Alex [SMTP:leealex@...]
> > wrote:
> > > Invit him/her lor.
> > >
> > > U get my vote.
> > >
> > > BIBI, Handsomes Druid , Anywhere.
> > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > > To: '* Singapore EQ Mailing List' <sg-everquest@egroups.com>
> > > Sent: Wednesday, June 07, 2000 11:25 AM
> > > Subject: [sg-everquest] Introducing a new friend ;)
> > >
> > >
> > > > Hi,
> > > >
> > > > I've 2 UO friends who join us in EQ Innoruuk. They are both my
closest
> > > > buddies in UO Baja, and have gone thru's numerous live & death
battles
> > > with
> > > > me in my entire UO life. Both of them are veteran online RPGers,
so
> > you
> > > > guys dun have to worry abt them behaving like a newbie, hehe.
> > > >
> > > > They are Mistaya (lvl 30? wood elf ranger) and Yura (lvl 9 high-elf
> > > > enchanter).
> > > >
> > > > Mistaya is playing in US time zone, so for those US players, if you
are
> > > > training ya twink at ya timezone, do consider her as a team member.
;)
> > > >
> > > > Yura is now staying in Australia, and is playing around S'pore time
> > zone.
> > > > So for S'pore twinks, you know who to ask for hunting ;)
> > > >
> > > > Both of them are mature players, so you know you can count on them
at
> > all
> > > > times. Pls be nice to them if u happen to meet them online, thx.
> > > >
> > > > As Mistaya is playing in US timezone, she might be better off
joining
> > US
> > > > guild. Yura, on the other hand, play in our timezone. Maybe some
of u
> > > can
> > > > team with her and find out more abt her. I really wish to invite
her
> > to
> > > > the guild and I know she will contribute well in EQ, just like my
UO
> > guild
> > > > in Baja.
> > > >
> > > > Thx.
> > > >
> > > > Ziltus.
> > > >
